html: (2/2) We've been very clear that the UK will have an independent trade policy covering all aspects of goods and services, that we will be able to set our own tariffs, and we will be able to negotiate, sign and ratify new free trade agreements after we leave the EU on 29 March.
text: (2/2) We've been very clear that the UK will have an independent trade policy covering all aspects of goods and services, that we will be able to set our own tariffs, and we will be able to negotiate, sign and ratify new free trade agreements after we leave the EU on 29 March.

html: (1/2) Trade between the US and the UK is worth more than £180bn and accounts for a fifth of all UK exports. We have more than a trillion dollars invested in each other’s economies. This is one of the most successful trade and investment relationships in the world.

html: Not mentioned in the budget speech but the Welsh Government will get increased borrowing powers. It can currently borrow £1bn for big infrastructure projects. That will increase by £300m. UK Govt says it's for 'supporting the delivery of the M4 relief road.'

html: Spending on mental health services is at record levels and growing, but there is more to do. Today we're committing up to £1.8 million for the Samaritans helpline over the next four years. And have appointed the first ever Minister for Suicide Prevention. #PMQspic.twitter.com/kLhFwmmMpq
text:

And have appointed the first ever Minister for Suicide Prevention.

html: In July, just 84% of patients at Glan Clwyd A&E were admitted, transferred or discharged within TWELVE hours. The average for equivalent departments in England was 84% within FOUR hours. The 4hr performance at YGC was a shocking 55%. N Wales deserves better. #failingdevolvedNHS
text: In July, just 84% of patients at Glan Clwyd A&E were admitted, transferred or discharged within TWELVE hours. The average for equivalent departments in England was 84% within FOUR hours. The 4hr performance at YGC was a shocking 55%. N Wales deserves better. #failingdevolvedNHS

html: And now for something completely different! Completely amazed to welcome a Green Heron to west Wales. As a resident of Costa Rica and the US only 5 have ever been seen in UK and one turns up in my garden. Birders from all over UK heading my way..@exitthelemmingpic.twitter.com/RJSflX94WP

html: The UK Government has launched its #AISectorDeal. Industry and government have worked together to develop a £1bn deal to put the nation at the forefront of the #AI industry: http://bit.ly/2JpSyJB  @AlunCairns talks about what this means for Wales. @beisgovuk #IndustrialStrategypic.twitter.com/HBpMEc5Ftz

The Billion dollar #AISectorDeal deal will put UK & its industry a billion steps ahead. It also includes more than 300mn of newly allocated govt funding for #AI research.#GREATforCollaboration @DCMS @tradegovuk @margot_james_mp @UKGovWales @AlunCairns @beisgovukpic.twitter.com/M5JRQhmAZQ
